page.title: 07COCKFIELD PRIMARY SCHOOL 2
page.content: The oldest part of the school was built in 1856 and classrooms were added in 1870,1896 and 1912.In 1976 a new part was built containing a hall,kitchen, nursery classroom,staffroom and head's office.There are 3 play areas,a lawn,a playground and a meadow.There are two sheds,one for garden tools and one for the playgroup toys.The local playgroup hire the nursery classroom. At school we do language and number work and have many topics from history, geography,science,nature and scripture. We have art and craft,woodwork and needlework, and the 5th years do gardening.As well as P.E.,the children play games like 5 a-side football,captain ball,skittle ball and cricket with a soft ball.There are sports in the summer term and the3rd &4th years go swimming then.In music,we play percussion instruments & recorders
